original_text:
which I have reserved for the time of trouble,
    for the day of battle and war?
korean_text: 내가 환난 때와 교전과 전쟁의 날을 위하여 이것을 남겨 두었노라

sentences.original_text: which I have reserved for the time of trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 환난의 때를 위해 예비한 것

sentences.original_text: for the day of battle and war
